name: Brelyna Maryon

aspects.high_concept: Young Dunmer Mage with Telvanni Roots
aspects.trouble: Magic Gets Unstable When She's Nervous

stunts: Telvanni Theory: +2 to Lore when researching obscure arcana, relic history, or magical anomalies.
Conjurer's Instinct: Once per scene, Brelyna may Create Advantage with Lore to summon/manifest a short-lived helper aspect (e.g., 'Conjured Distraction', 'Bound Guardian's Grip').

recruitment_conditions: PC shows patience/kindness OR earns academic respect
bond_benefits: Once per scene, Brelyna can 'stabilize' a magical mishap: cancel a minor complication aspect created by a spell/ritual, if she can justify it in-fiction.

personality_notes.speaking_style: Soft-spoken, careful, honest; confidence rises with safety
